mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, pwd, name, email, phone, zip_num, address1, address2, address3, provider) values (#{userid}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{zip_num}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{provider})
mapper.select: select * from member where name=#{name} and phone=#{phone}
mapper.update: update member set pwd=#{pwd} where userid=#{userid}
